data.title: Bigg Boss 18 Contestants List 2024 Names & Photos, Premiere
data.meta_description: Popular TV Show Bigg Boss 18 Contestants Name List With Photo 2024 and the 1st Confirmed Participant name with details, BB 18 Participants
data.text:
This news is especially for you if you are a Bigg Boss TV show fan. After the previous successful season of Bigg Boss 17, Bigg Boss 18 will start soon on Colours TV and jiocinema. Last season Munavvar Farooqui won Bigg Boss 17. Before that MC stan, win season 16.

Bigg Boss 18 Contestants List

In this blog post, we will give you complete information on Bigg Boss 18 Contestants List with their photos, so you can identify them.

Bigg Boss 18 Contestants List With Photo

Today in this blog post we will give you complete information about Bigg Boss 18 Contestants Name list With Photos.

Krishna Shroff

Krishan Shroff is a well-known face in Bollywood. She is the daughter of Bollywood superstar Jackie Shroff and sister of Tiger Shroff. Recently we saw her in Kharton Ke Khiladi.

Isha Koppikar

She is a popular Bollywood actress who started her career in Fiza Movie. For a very long time, she has not been active in movies but on social media.

Anu Aggrawal

Aashiqui Movie (1990) Fame Anu Aggarwal is also approch For Bigg Boss season 18. She is getting popular for her 1st Movie and after that, she does many other movies.

Shiney Ahuja

He started his career in Bollywood in the movie Hazaaron Khwaishein Aisi in 2005. Now is not active in movies as well as on social media.

Gurucharan Singh

Gurucharan Singh is a TV actor Popular From her TV Show Taarak Mehta ka Ooltah Chashmah. In this show, he plays the role of Sodhi.

Siwet Tomar

Popular Contestant in Roadies and Splitsvilla now approaches for BB Season 18. He is very popular and also a wild card entry in Splitsvilla.

Shoaib Ibrahim

Bigg Boss team approached Shoaib Ibrahim for season 18. He is the husband of popular TV actress Deepika Kakar who was the winner of Bigg Boss 12.

Sameera Reddy

Sameera Reddy is one of the most popular Bollywood actresses of their time. She started her career in Maine Dil Tujko Diya Movie in 2002. Now she has been away from Bollywood for the last 10 years.

Rajat Dalal

Popular Fitness Influencer Rajat Dalal’s name is also in the Limelight. Her name came in many controversies and the makers of this show approached her.

Kritika Malik

Bigg Boss OTT Fame Kritika Malik is now seen in season 18. On their social media, she confirms that Makers approach her.

Samay Raina

Popular Standup comedian Samay Raina’s approach for next season. He is recently popular when he does a Rost of Kusha Kapila.

Kashish Kapoor

Splitsvilla Fame Kashish Kapoor may enter Bigg Boss house for next season. She is one of the most popular contestants, and getting popularity from this show. In this show, she is very bold and active in every task.

Maxtern

He is also a YouTuber / Social Media influencer. He becomes famous when he has a conflict with Elvish Yadav.

Khushi Punjaban And Vivek Chaudhary

Poplar Youtuber Khushi Punjaban And Vivek Chaudhary may come in Bigg Boss season 18. Recently they came in the limelight when they were not active on social media due to family issues.

Pooja Sharma Rekha

According to Teletalk, Bigg Boss Season 18 makers approach pooja Sharma Rekha, who is very popular on social media. She is transgender, and getting popular on social media in the last few months.

Dolly Chaiwala

In the last few months, Dolly ki Tapri has been very popular all over India, especially in Nagpur. He became more famous when Microsoft founder Bill Gates came to India and made a video with Dolly Chaiwala.

Digvijay Singh Rathee

If you are aware of MTV Roadies Or Splitsvilla, Then You must have heard about the name “Digvijay Singh Rathee”.He is one of the popular contestants in their shows.

Faisel Seikh (Mr Faisu)

Faisal Shaikh aka Mr Faisu is also approached by the Bigg Boss team for Season 18. If you are a fan of Mr. Faisu, then this season will be exciting for you.

Thugesh

Popular YouTuber Thugesh is also an approach for BB 18. He is very popular for their roasting videos and has a good fan following on social media.

Zayn Saifi

Zayn Saifi is a popular YouTuber and is known for their YouTube channel round 2 hell. Started his career on YouTube with their friends.

Sheezan Khan

In 2020 Sheezan Khan came to LimeLight when he was in jail for 70 days. He was accused in the Tunisha Sharma case. After this controversy see came to the media overnight.

Dalljiet Kaur

She is a popular TV actress born on the 15th of November 1982. She also did some reality shows like Nach Baliye in 2019 with her ex-husband Shalin Bhanot.

Fukra Insaan (Abhishek Malhan)

Last year Abhishek Malhan aka Fukra Insaan is also part of Bigg Boss OTT season 2. According to the news team, Bigg Boss approached Abhishek again for Season 18.

Deepika Arya

Deepika Arya social media personality and wife of popular YouTuber and former Bigg Boss contestant Tehelka Prank aka Sunny Arya.

Harsh Beniwal

As you all know Harsh Beniwal is a popular YouTuber, and content creator. He is gaining huge popularity on the internet due to his funny videos.

Surbhi Jyoti

Surbhi Jyoti is a well-known name in the TV industry. She gained popularity from her romantic drama show Qubool Hai which was telecast on Zee TV.

Karan Patel

If you are a TV fan then you must know about Karan Patel. He is a popular TV actor, and anchor born in the year 1983 in Kolkata. He gained popularity from the TV show Yeh Hai Mohabbatein and another show Kasauti Zindagi Ki 2.

Somy Ali

Today’s kids are not aware of the name of Somy Ali, 80’s and 90’s kids know about her. She is a Pakistani American actress. She started her career in Bollywood at the age of 16.

Nusrat Jahan

She is an Indian actress and politician. Mostly working in Bengali cinema. She also connected with Trinamool Congress and became a member of parliament in 2019.

Alice Kaushik

Alice may become a part of Bigg Boss 18. She is a popular TV actress and getting popularity from Star Plus show Pandya Store from the character name Raavi.

Main page:- Bigg Boss Audience Entry Process

Bigg Boss 18 Start Date and Timings

The show’s premiere is going to be held on 5th October 2024. The timing of this shows 10 pm from Monday to Friday and 9 PM on Saturday and Sunday is Weekend Ka Vaar.
